doc.title: Fight For 1.5! - Fridays For Future - Sign our Promise and join an action!
doc.excerpt: 5 years since commiting to 1.5 degrees Celsius with the Paris Agreement but too little has been done. We need action. We need you to #FightFor1Point5, sign our Promise and join our local worldwide actions against climate change.

main.head: Fight For 1.5!
main.p: On Saturday, December 12th, people from around the world came together to celebrate the fifth anniversary of the Paris Agreement. But there is no reason for celebration. Our leaders failed to contribute to a 1.5 degree pathway and the climate crisis is becoming uncontrollable. Read more!
We can’t allow that to continue to happen.
main.head: Sign the Promise
main.p: Five years ago, our governments promised to limit global temperature rise to well below 2°. However, they have failed to treat the climate crisis like a crisis. It’s time for us to make a promise: we will fight for the world we want, for our present, and for our future.
Read our promise and sign it to join us and #FightFor1Point5!
main.head: WEBINARS
main.p: Why is the #FightFor1Point5 so essential and what are the practical steps we can take in order to make it happen? Join the YesMen and CANVAS, so you can find out all this and more in our recorded webinars from the 11th of December!

main.p: Try out our ProfilePic generators and help us share our Promise with these social media sharepix, videos and posts or join our Twitterstorm.
